TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapRpcMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapRpcMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapRpcMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定发送至和源自该方法的 SOAP 消息使用 格式设置。

span.span: Specifies that SOAP messages sent to and from the method use formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义如何在 SOAP 消息中格式化的 XML Web 服务方法中或运算，两种风格：`RPC`和`Document`。Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, or operation, can be formatted in a SOAP message: `RPC` and `Document`. `RPC` 格式设置是指格式根据 SOAP 规范 RPC; 而使用 SOAP 操作也称为 SOAP 规范的第 7 节。`RPC` formatting refers to formatting the operation according to the SOAP specification for using SOAP for RPC; otherwise known as Section 7 of the SOAP specification. `RPC` 格式设置的状态的所有参数都封装在单个 XML 元素名为 XML Web 服务方法后，该 XML 元素中的每个 XML 元素表示它所表示的参数命名的参数。`RPC` formatting states that all parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element named after the XML Web service method and that each XML element within that XML element represents a parameter named after the parameter it is representing. SOAP 消息进行格式化的同时`RPC`和`Document`样式可以用于通信与 XML Web 服务以远程过程调用 (RPC) 方式运行; 但是`Document`样式也很容易可用来进行松散耦合通信方式。SOAP messages formatted in both the `RPC` and `Document` styles can be used to communicate with an XML Web service in a Remote Procedure Call (RPC) manner; however the `Document` style can also easily be used to communicate in a loosely coupled manner. 因此，`Document`建议样式 XML Web 服务。Therefore, `Document` style XML Web services is recommended. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅`Customizing SOAP Messages`主题。For more details, see the `Customizing SOAP Messages` topic. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d777288-c0d9-4e6a-b638-f010da031952)。For more details, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d777288-c0d9-4e6a-b638-f010da031952). 此特性可以应用于服务器上的 XML Web 服务方法和客户端上的代理类。This attribute can be applied to an XML Web service method on the server and a proxy class on the client. XML Web 服务方法具有属性设置为`true`的确可以访问其。XML Web service methods that have the property set to `true` do not have access to their . 在这种情况下，访问的属性的任何类返回`null`。As such, accessing any of the properties of the class return `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将消息样式设置为`Rpc`为`GetUserName`XML Web service 方法。The following code example sets the message style to `Rpc` for the `GetUserName` XML Web service method.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting all properties to their default values.

span.span: The intent of the SOAP request.
Sets the property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并将 属性设置为 参数的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the value of the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Action { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

span.span: The HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: 默认值是http://tempuri.org/MethodName其中 MethodName 是 XML Web service 方法的名称。

span.span: The default is http://tempuri.org/MethodName where MethodName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，属性是，该值指示 SOAP 请求的意图的 URI。Typically, the property is a URI indicating the intent of the SOAP request. 但是，SOAP 规范格式和 URI 是否引用现有文档上放置不受限制。However, the SOAP specification places no restrictions on the format and whether the URI refers to an existing document. 状态和内容Web 服务器可以使用属性，如防火墙以适当地筛选 SOAP 请求中 HTTP 消息。The presence and content of the property can be used by Web servers such as firewalls to appropriately filter SOAP request messages in HTTP. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 1.1 版发布中的属性`soapAction`属性`soap:operation`每个元素支持为 XML Web 服务生成的 WSDL 文档中 SOAP 绑定。By default, the .NET Framework version 1.1 publishes the property in the `soapAction` attribute of the `soap:operation` element for each supported SOAP binding in WSDL documents generated for an XML Web service. 支持的 SOAP 绑定是 SOAP 1.1。The supported SOAP binding is SOAP 1.1. 有关 SOAP 规范的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 网站 (http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP)。For more information about the SOAP specification, see the W3C Web site (http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`http://www.contoso.com/Sample`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com/Sample`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Binding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 方法为其实现操作的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding that an XML Web service method implements an operation for.

value.span: XML Web services 方法为其实现操作的绑定。

span.span: The binding an XML Web service method implements an operation for.

value.span: 默认为追加了“Soap”的 XML Web services 名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个绑定，如所定义的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)，是类似于一个接口，因为它定义一组具体的操作。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 对于 ASP.NET，每个 XML Web service 方法的绑定内的运算。With respect to ASP.NET, each XML Web service method is an operation within a binding. XML Web 服务方法是 XML Web 服务的默认绑定或绑定中指定的成员应用于 XML Web 服务。XML Web service methods are members of the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to an XML Web service. XML Web 服务可以实现多个绑定，如果选择多个特性应用到 XML Web 服务。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings, if multiple attributes are applied to an XML Web service. 一次一个或多个特性应用到 XML Web 服务，或可应用于单个 XML Web 服务方法，以便指示由特定的 XML Web 服务方法实现的绑定操作。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 设置属性或指定的绑定 XML Web 服务方法实现了一项操作。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method implements an operation for. 只有一个或可应用于 XML Web 服务方法。Only one or can be applied to an XML Web service method. 因此，XML Web 服务方法只能实现一个绑定的操作。Therefore, an XML Web service method can only implement an operation for one binding. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 XML Web 服务中的多个绑定。The following code example demonstrates how to implement multiple bindings within an XML Web service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OneWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 客户端是否等待 Web 服务器完成对 XML Web services 方法的处理。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing an XML Web service method.

value.span: 如果 XML Web services 客户端不等待 Web 服务器完成对 XML Web services 方法的处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process an XML Web service method; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XML Web 服务方法具有属性设置为`true`，XML Web 服务客户端没有等待要完成处理 XML Web service 方法的 Web 服务器。When an XML Web service method has the property set to `true`, the XML Web service client does not have to wait for the Web server to finish processing the XML Web service method. Web 服务器消息反序列化时，就会立即，但调用 XML Web 服务方法之前，服务器将返回 HTTP 202 状态代码。As soon as the Web server has deserialized the , but before it invokes the XML Web service method, the server returns an HTTP 202 status code. HTTP 202 状态代码指示客户端到 Web 服务器已开始处理消息。An HTTP 202 status code indicates to the client that the Web server has started processing the message. 因此，XML Web 服务客户端接收任何 Web 服务器已成功处理了消息的确认。Therefore, an XML Web service client receives no acknowledgment that the Web server successfully processed the message. 单向方法不能具有返回值或任何`out`参数。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any `out` parameters. 如果你使用具有.NET Framework 1.0 版 XML Web 服务方法或属性应用于它们与属性设置为`true`，不允许访问其使用静态属性。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 XML Web service methods that have either the or attribute applied to them with the property set to `true`, do not allow access to their using the static property. 访问，派生类实现中的 XML Web 服务方法和访问属性。To access the , derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from and access the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`true`。The following code example sets the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestElementName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 默认值是 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性已过时。This property is obsolete. 它不会影响任何行为。It does not affect any behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`MyCustomRequestElement`。The following code example sets the property to `MyCustomRequestElement`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestNamespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`http://www.contoso.com`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ResponseElementName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 响应关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 默认值是WebServiceNameResult，其中WebServiceName是 XML Web service 方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is WebServiceNameResult, where WebServiceName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义用于封装内的参数的 XML 元素`Body`的 SOAP 响应的元素。The property defines the XML element used to encapsulate the parameters within the `Body` element of the SOAP response. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`MyCustomResponseElement`。The following code example sets the property to `MyCustomResponseElement`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ResponseNamespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 响应关联的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 响应关联的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于在 XSD 架构中其服务说明中的 XML Web 服务方法。The property is used in the XSD schema for the XML Web service method in its service description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`http://www.contoso.com`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse Use { System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在调用该方法时所使用的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding used when invoking the method.

value.span: 枚举的成员，指定在调用该方法时所使用的绑定。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the binding used when invoking the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 。The default value of this property is .
